english_example_sentence: You should carefully follow all instructions in this new project.
russian_example_sentence: Вы должны внимательно следовать всем инструкциям в этом новом проекте.
turkish_example_sentence: Siz, bu yeni projede tüm talimatları dikkatle takip edesiniz.
turkish_example_sentence_with_blank: Siz, bu yeni projede tüm talimatları dikkatle ______.
